# EmStanS 

## Overview

This package aims to support Embedded Standard Setting, calculating counts and weights.


## Install


```{r}
devtools::install_github("sooyongl/EmStanS")
```

The documentation is available at [here](https://sooyongl.github.io/EmStanS/).

## Usage

```{r}
data <- read.csv(filePath)
fit <- emstans(
  data = data, 
  lvname = c("Level1", "Level2", "Level3")
  )

```
